Package Server.Core

Produces the main post sign in Vicar page and the utilities necessary for user file management and output file download.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileData
    Used by Vicar.java for Vicar Collection information.
    FileDownload
    A Generator which returns a specified data file from the directory structure into a ServletOutputStream for delivery to a browser via http.
    SchemaData
    Stores information associated with a Relax NG Schema file.
    SchemaList
    Produces a list of SchemaData for for population of a select list on the main page by Vicar.
    Vicar
    Generator which implements the collections structure in a unix directory and provides a way for the user to invoke Abbot.
    ZipUtil
    Utilities for zip/unzip, gzip/gunzip, and tar/untar.

Package Server.Core Description

Produces the main post sign in Vicar page and the utilities necessary for user file management and output file download. All other functionality except sign in is reachable from the Vicar.html page.
Version:
0.8, 12/15/2012
Author:
Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
